Footer.companyDescription: Leading provider of sustainable agricultural solutions for farmers across Africa and the Middle East.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest updates and offers.

About.title: About Us
About.subtitle: Pioneering sustainable agricultural solutions for a greener future
About.storyPara1: Founded in 2010, Egypt Green began with a simple mission: to provide farmers with sustainable agricultural solutions that enhance productivity while preserving the environment.
About.storyPara2: What started as a small research initiative has grown into a leading provider of organic agricultural products across Africa and the Middle East, serving thousands of farmers with innovative solutions.
About.storyPara3: Today, we continue to expand our reach and impact, developing new products and technologies that address the evolving challenges of modern agriculture.
About.storyImageAlt: Egypt Green founders in the field
About.missionVisionSubtitle: Guided by our commitment to sustainable agriculture and farmer success
About.missionText: To empower farmers with sustainable agricultural solutions that enhance productivity, preserve the environment, and improve livelihoods.
About.missionPoint2: Provide accessible solutions for all farmers
About.visionText: To be the leading provider of sustainable agricultural solutions in Africa and the Middle East, driving the transition to regenerative farming.
About.visionPoint3: Improve food security and farmer prosperity
About.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide our work and relationships

values.sustainabilityDesc: Commitment to environmental stewardship in all our products and operations
values.qualityDesc: Delivering premium products that meet the highest standards of effectiveness
values.communityDesc: Building strong relationships with farmers and agricultural communities
values.innovationDesc: Continuously developing new solutions to address evolving challenges

About.teamSubtitle: Meet the dedicated professionals behind Egypt Green
About.joinUsText: Interested in partnering with us or learning more about our sustainable agricultural solutions?

seo.title: Become an Agent for Egypt Green Factory
seo.description: Join Egypt Green Factory as a distributor and access a comprehensive range of high-quality fertilizers and soil amendments. Partner with us for guaranteed quality, reliable supply, and expert support in the agricultural market.
seo.keywords: Egypt Green, fertilizer distributor, agricultural solutions, soil amendments, NPK fertilizers, foliar fertilizers, micronutrients, soil conditioners, global distribution, agricultural partnership

seo.title: Agricultural Products & Fertilizers | Egypt Green - Premium Solutions for African & Asian Soils
seo.description: Discover Egypt Green's comprehensive range of agricultural fertilizers, soil enhancers, and plant nutrition solutions. Specially formulated for African and Asian soils with proven results in over 15 countries.
seo.keywords: agricultural fertilizers, NPK fertilizers, soil enhancers, plant nutrition, organic fertilizers, foliar fertilizers, micronutrients, soil conditioners, African agriculture, Asian soils, Egypt Green products, agricultural solutions, farming products, crop nutrition
